prompts: What are your most cherished beliefs about life and how do they shape your identity?
Have you ever found yourself reacting differently than expected in a certain situation? If so, can you describe it and how did it make you feel?
What does your inner voice say to you when you doubt yourself the most?
What significant event from your childhood continues to influence your outlook on life today?
What's an emotion that makes you uncomfortable and why?
How does your personality change when you're in different social settings? Do you ever feel like you're wearing a mask to fit in?
What old story do you tell yourself that no longer serves you?
When do you feel like your true self?
What is one piece of feedback you've received that seems to stick with you?
What seemingly opposite traits do you possess that make up your unique personality?
What aspect of your life needs more attention right now?
How do you typically react when you feel stressed?
What do you think your closest friend might see in you that you don't?
What do you say to yourself when you can't sleep at night?
